subtitle.text: Get answers to your Canada.ca questions.
subtitle.ariaLabel: Get answers to your Canada dot CA questions.

intro.researchOnly: Answers provided by this AI service are information, not official advice.  Improvements are ongoing.

ariaLabel.first: This is Canada dot CA AI answers, please enter your question.
ariaLabel.followon: Ask a follow-on question or reply.
ariaLabel.skipfo: Skip and ask a follow-on question

about.title: About AI Answers

feedback.surveyLink: Share your feedback (opens in new tab)
feedback.question: How was this answer?

publicFeedback.surveyLink: Tell us more! AI Answers feedback survey (opens in new tab)
publicFeedback.question: Was this helpful?

yes.question: Why was it helpful? Select the best option below. (required)

options.noCall: I don't need to call the government
options.noVisit: I don't need to visit an office
options.savedTime: Saved me time searching and reading
options.other: Other - please fill out the survey

no.question: Why wasn't it helpful? Select the best option below. (required)

options.notWanted: Answer is clear, but is not what I wanted to hear
options.other: Other - please fill out the survey

privacy.title: Privacy and AI terms of use
privacy.storage: To protect your privacy, questions containing personal information (like phone numbers or email addresses) are blocked. You'll see sensitive content marked with XXX and be asked to rephrase. Blocked questions are not sent to our AI service or stored. All other questions, answers and your feedback are stored to improve system performance.
privacy.disclaimer: Use the Government of Canada website link provided in the response to check your answer. Responses generated by this AI system should not be considered as professional, legal, or medical advice. We attempt to ensure the accuracy of the information provided but there is a possibility that the information may contain inaccuracies, and the information may not yet reflect recent changes or fulfill your particular needs or purposes.
privacy.terms: This AI system relies on information provided on Government of Canada websites and your use of this system and any information generated is also subject to the

timeout.message: Reload the page to try again.

errors.serviceUnavailable: AI Answers is unavailable until tomorrow due to reaching daily usage limits. Please check back then.

messages.thinkingWithContext: Deriving answer from search results and department.
messages.limitReached:
You've reached the limit of 3 questions per conversation.
Reload to start a new conversation.
messages.error: Sorry, we're having a problem connecting to the service right now. Please try again in a few minutes.
messages.blockedContent: Your question used words that aren't accepted. Please ask it differently below.
messages.blockedMessage: Your question was not sent to the AI service.
messages.privateContent: To protect your privacy, your question was not sent to the AI service. Ask it differently below without any personal information.
messages.privacyMessage: Personal information in your question is marked as XXX.
messages.characterLimit: Your message is {count} {unit} too long. Please simplify your question.

upload.intro: Select the AI service, language, and your CSV file. Use one you've downloaded and cleaned from the Feedback viewer.

items.context: Context Properties - optional - If left blank, the batch will first derive context, if provided it will use the provided context to retrieve answers
